title: Ep. 965 - Gay, Black, Leftist Male Privilege
description:
Jussie Smollett walks after just a few days in jail, a leaked GOP email suggests the party will go easy on Biden’s SCOTUS nominee, and Ukrainian president Zelensky begs for World War III in Congress.
